type.description: The eget module downloads and installs eget (https://github.com/zyedidia/eget) and uses it to install a user-provided list of packages from github repositories or other URLs. Note that this is inherently *INSECURE*!

install-script-checksum.description: Checksum for the install script to verify authenticity. Acquired from https://github.com/zyedidia/eget?tab=readme-ov-file#quick-install-script

config-location.description: Full path to the eget.toml configuration file on the system for eget to use. Must be copied into place with the 'files' module prior to running this module.

install-packages.description: List of github repositories (format: `org/repo` or `user/repo`) or URLs to install packages from. Github repos must have releases to use. If eget is unable to determine the correct package non-interactively, the module will fail. Use an `eget.toml` file (copied to `config-location` (by default `/etc/eget/eget.toml`) to configure eget to provide filters to aid eget in grabbing the right packages.
